_comment: English translations for JavaScript Cheat Code

javascript.description: JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted programming language. A complete reference for beginners.

Console.title: Console

変数.title: Variables
変数.description: Variable declaration with let, const, var

文字列.title: Strings

コメント.title: Comments

代入演算子.title: Assignment Operators

文字列補間.title: String Interpolation

letキーワード.title: let Keyword

constキーワード.title: const Keyword

if文.title: if Statement

三項演算子.title: Ternary Operator

論理演算子 ||.title: Logical Operator ||
論理演算子 ||.code:
true || false;       // true
10 > 5 || 10 > 20;   // true
false || false;      // false
10 > 100 || 10 > 20; // false

論理演算子 &&.title: Logical Operator &&
論理演算子 &&.code:
true && true;        // true
1 > 2 && 2 > 1;      // false
true && false;       // false
4 === 4 && 3 > 1;    // true

論理演算子 !.title: Logical Operator !

Null合体演算子 ??.title: Nullish Coalescing ??
Null合体演算子 ??.code:
null ?? 'I win';           //  'I win'
undefined ?? 'Me too';     //  'Me too'

false ?? 'I lose'          //  false
0 ?? 'I lose again'        //  0
'' ?? 'Damn it'            //  ''

else if.title: else if

switch文.title: switch Statement

== vs ===.title: == vs ===
== vs ===.code:
0 == false   // true
0 === false  // false, different type
1 == "1"     // true,  automatic type conversion 
1 === "1"    // false, different type
null == undefined  // true
null === undefined // false
'0' == false       // true
'0' === false      // false
